mapper.insert: insert into cart_table(user_id, goods_id, number, goods_name, goods_url, create_time, update_time) VALUES(#{userId},#{goodsId},#{number},#{goodsName},#{goodsUrl},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.update: update cart_table set user_id = #{userId}, goods_id = #{goodsId}, number = #{number}, goods_name = #{goodsName}, goods_url = #{goodsUrl}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
